TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, we can't talk anywhere.

I wish to have a free conversation thread, just one PLZ PLZ

Granted, but it turns into 4chans /b/

I wish my mouse would work!

granted it bites you

(the IRC channle... we have one...go to it)

I wish for stuffs

Ok, but its a armed bomb

I wish for some cheese.

Granted, Kraft cheez, mioum!

I wish for a tasty breakfast

Granted, but it gives you explosive diarrhea.

I wish for free internet.

Granted, It's full of advertisings

I wish for mudkip

Granted. There's no way I could ever corrupt this wish.

I wish someone else could corrupt that wish.

Granted, I turn horrible and you get depressed

I wish that I could have an illumination

Granted, You will be in a room filled with dense cyanide gas.

I wish that I could learn to fly aircraft.

granted, you crash on your first flight.

I wish this thread would derail.

granted....

I wish that I could stop derailing things...

Grant.... Nooooooooooooo! Cuteness overload!

(can't stop looking ar it!)

I wish that I understanded the IRC thing

Granted, you set up a spy network and the government tracks you down.

I wish for more time on my hands

Granted, You're holding a tardis and daleks are incoming

I wish to be able to stop a chain reaction when... *cought cought Some subjets outbreak, you know?...

*cough and granted but due to lack of proper grammer it ends up as a nuck exploding in your face

I wish that we could stop derailing every thread we get on

Granted. I'm going to start following you lot around locking every thread you derail. So knock it off unless you want half the threads in the section locked for off topic.

I wish my lottery ticket was a winner.

Granted, but they're keeping falling!

(you silly ninja!)

Granted, but people are assaulting your house for money

I wish that the Great Forum Repression was just a nightmare!

granted... but that's only on the other side of the 4th wall

I wish for underailable threads

Granted, but then some really, really incredible idiot comes along and breaks the IdiotProofingSystem.

I wish we could all just let my thread continue on its merry way without being destroyed by lesser minds. ._.

Granted, they come to your house to kill you :3

The user below me likes kitty faces

ah... granted but everyone turns in to "these lesser minds"

I wish for and idiot proof thread

and ninjaed...

Granted. The forum evolves and a better idiot appears.

I wish I had a bigger lock thread button.

Granted, but I may need to borrow it.

I wish people had empathy enough to understand other people's perspectives for once.

Granted. Then the machines rise up and kill us all, since they have no empathy.

I wish for a lucky penny.
